Package Controller

Class PaymentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.PaymentController
public class PaymentController extends Object
Payment Controller houses the various methods that the staff can use with regards to the updating of room prices, discount and tax rate.
Since:
2022-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cheong Jin Hui

  • Constructor Details

    • PaymentController

      public PaymentController()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init() throws IOException
      This method initialize all the values of the room prices of the each type of room on weekday and weekend, the discount as well as tax rate. We extract the values from the data in our payment database as the value of each attribute is separated by '|'. It set those values respectively using the setter method.
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be read or to closed

    • save

      public static void save() throws IOException
      This method saves all the values of the room prices of the each type of room on weekday and weekend, the discount as well as tax rate. We extract the values from the prices of each room type on weekday and on weekend, the discount and tax rate in array list guestList and separate the values by '|', our separator. We then combine all the values into a string and add to a list of string containing the values of the attributes.
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be written to or closed.

    • adjustDiscountPrice

      public static void adjustDiscountPrice(double d)
      This method allows the staff to set the percentage of discount the hotel wants to implement.
      Parameters:
      d - This is the percentage of the discount the hotel wants to set

    • printDiscountPrice

      public static void printDiscountPrice()
      This method allows the staff to print the current percentage of discount of the hotel.

    • adjustTaxRate

      public static void adjustTaxRate(double d)
      This method allows the staff to set the percentage of tax the hotel wants to implement.
      Parameters:
      d - This is the percentage of the tax the hotel wants to set

    • printTaxRate

      public static void printTaxRate()
      This method allows the staff to print the current percentage of tax of the hotel.

    • adjustRoomPrice

      public static void adjustRoomPrice(double weekday, double weekend, String s)
      Sets the prices of a particular room type on weekday and on weekend.
      Parameters:
      weekday - Price of that particular room on a weekday.
      weekend - Price of that particular room on a weekend.
      s - Type of the room.

    • displayAllPrice

      public static void displayAllPrice()
      Display the prices of every room type on weekday and on weekend. This allows the staff to have an overview of the cost of each room.

    • displayPage

      public static void displayPage()
      This method calls the payment user interface which will display all the options that the staff can choose with regards to adjusting values of the room prices of the each type of room on weekday and weekend, the discount as well as tax rate.

    • getDiscountRate

      public static double getDiscountRate()
      Gets the percentage of the discount rate of the hotel from payment class.
      Returns:
      the hotel's discount rate.

    • getTaxRate

      public static double getTaxRate()
      Gets the percentage of the tax rate of the hotel from payment class.
      Returns:
      the hotel's tax rate.
